info.title: Navigapi API
info.description: Mock API documentation for Navigapi — API Security for Logistics, Transportation, and Supply Chain Technology.

get.description: Describes what Navigapi focuses on — securing the flow of freight data, quotes, and billing logic.
Explains why API security is critical for logistics and transportation platforms and how Navigapi identifies logic risks.
Introduces the founder and Navigapi’s background in logistics, transportation, and API pentesting.
Outlines when API security matters most — during development, updates, or integrations within supply chain systems.
Defines Navigapi’s testing scope — remote, production-safe, and controlled environments across logistics and mobility systems.
Details Navigapi’s manual, precision-based testing approach for identifying logic flaws and vulnerabilities in APIs that move freight and people.
Explains Navigapi’s mission and its logistics-first approach to API security, combining real operations knowledge with modern pentesting.
Shows Navigapi’s background across parcel, LTL, FTL, brokerage, and freight forwarding operations.
Outlines Navigapi’s different API security testing services including bug bounty-style testing, recon, mobile testing, and full pentests.
Explains Navigapi’s step-by-step approach — recon, instrumentation, traversal, analysis, prioritization, and remediation.
Provides Navigapi’s social and contact information for connecting via LinkedIn, Bugcrowd, or email.
